name: Sanction Management Module - SOLI-LMS
description: A dedicated module within the SOLI-LMS system for managing learner sanctions based on absenteeism. It supports automatic daily checks, manual triggers, rule customization, statistical dashboards, and sanction history.

name: Blog App
description: A dynamic blogging platform built with Laravel 11 and Vue 3, featuring article management, comment support, modular architecture, and a clean TailwindCSS interface.
